page.title: 05Amenities
page.content: Amenities {Trade}Robertsbridge has a variety of shops.These are:-grocer,greengrocer,baker,butcher, ironmonger,newsagent,hairdresser,elect rical shop,wool shop,garden machine centre,D.I.Y.and three antique shops.There are 2 banks,a post office and two garages. { Entertainment}There are 5 pubs,2 restaurants,a working men's club and a recreation ground. { Clubs}There are many clubs:-W.I.,Mothers' Union,Young Farmers,Young Wives,Sunday club and 2 playgroups.Guides,Brownies,Cubs,Scouts ,sports and special interest Groups. {Relgion}There are 3 churches:-United Reform,Baptist,and the Parish Church of St.Mary the Virgin which is C.of E.
